techDescriptions.name: script-box/configure
remarks: [script-box/configure](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@script-box/configure.cli) is used to configure this solution.
Run the command `yarn configure` to configure the solution.
Run the command `yarn setup` to configure, add git hooks, document and format the solution.
It will configure the tools used by this solution, such as:

techDescriptions.name: Dependency Checking
remarks: Run the command `yarn depcheck` to check dependencies using [Depcheck](https://www.npmjs.com/package/depcheck).

techDescriptions.name: Document
remarks: Run the command `yarn document` to generate documentation using [script-box/document](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@script-box/document.cli).

techDescriptions.name: Format
remarks: Run the command `yarn format` to format code/artefacts using [Prettier](https://prettier.io/).

techDescriptions.name: Git Hooks
remarks: Run the command `yarn githooks` to setup:

- a pre-commit git hook to run [lint-staged](https://www.npmjs.com/package/lint-staged) which will format the code using [Prettier](https://prettier.io/).
- a prepare-commit-msg git hook to run [Commitizen](https://www.npmjs.com/package/commitizen) to prompt for a standard commit message.
